entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible bug: TypedReference* (and other restricted types) don't generate Warning CS8500 #65530
  • Autocompletion offers type parameters that already have a `where` constraint #65528

Closed

  • Bug with pointer to array (unsafer unsafeness) #65529
  • Compiler treats `string?` as `string` #65520
  • Receiver of a call taking InterpolatedStringHandler is unexpectedly copied in a way that mutations performed by the method are not observable #65470
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix `TResult` type in example diagram for incremental generators #65527
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65526
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #65523
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Avoid ordering dependency in active statement map #65525
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Ensure lvalue struct receivers are not copied by value due to interpolated string handler rewrite #65505
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65524
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup `SyntaxNormalizerTests` #65516
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove cast of string literal to string #65518
    Area-IDE, Community
